name: Autumn Harvest
description:
Autumn Harvest

Buy seeds, Plant it, and Sell it! This is a game of autumn harvesting, have fun!

How to Play:
1. Use only mouse to play
2. Click on a soil tile to select, then click on "Buy" button in the right panel
3. After the growing time, the soil will pop up the Plant. Click on it to sell it and gain money
4. Repeat and Chase the Target!

Note: The "X" Sign means you can't plant in the area. Mind your move!

- Great Harvest Game Jam 2020 -
